a.title: Go to Horizon Honors Elementary School (Grades K-6)
Go to Horizon Honors Secondary School (Grades 7-12)

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

p.span: Welcome To Horizon Honors Schools! It is my privilege to serve as Executive Director of our K-12 community, offering an exemplary education to over 1,500 students. When you join us, you become an important part of your child’s education and we welcome your involvement.

Our roots are founded in our mission statement and goals that come to life in the classrooms. We believe that all students deserve a gifted education and provide multiple opportunities for students to shine.

Leadership development is an important part of our curriculum. We truly believe that our students make the world a better place with what they learn at our schools. We provide opportunities for our students to showcase leadership and communication skills. Our core values are embedded in the curriculum and modeled daily.

With the majority of our students moving on to universities and colleges, they are prepared to succeed at higher education levels. Whether your child joins us in Kindergarten or as a Junior in High School, we work on their own individualized learning plans to prepare them for the next step in their life. There is no ceiling to what your child learns.
Betsy Fera
Executive Director

div.p: This web page may contain information directing users to one or more websites outside the Horizon Honors network, which are not associated with Horizon Honors and may not reflect the views or opinions of Horizon Honors. Horizon Honors does not have control over the content or accessibility of such websites. If you feel there is information you are unable to access on any third-party website, please contact that third-party directly to access the content.
